Body:
"""Test plotting function with one given engine or module.
    """
with tmpdir.as_cwd():
    if module in ['gromacs', 'namd']:
        output = (
            """Plotting GPU and CPU data.
Plotting all hosts in input file.
Plotting all modules for engine '{}'.
Your file was saved as 'testpng.png' in the working directory.
"""
            .format(module))
    else:
        output = (
            """Plotting GPU and CPU data.
Plotting all hosts in input file.
Plotting module '{}'.
Your file was saved as 'testpng.png' in the working directory.
"""
            .format(module))
    result = cli_runner.invoke(cli, ['plot', '--csv={}'.format(data[
        'test.csv']), '--module={}'.format(module), '--output-name=testpng'])
    assert result.exit_code == 0
    assert result.output == output
    assert os.path.exists('testpng.png')
pytest.mark.parametrize('module', ('gromacs', 'namd', 'namd/2.12',
    'gromacs/2018'))
